_header: Hail Maid chief of all / Through whom thee blessed man
Subjects: translations; Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Psalterium beate Marie, a translation of St. Thomas Aquinas — forty-nine 8-line stanzas, each preceded by Latin prose equivalent

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Heil Mayde cheef of alleÞorw whom þe blessed MonOf
                    þe born was In a stalleVs wrecches so visyte con…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þou hast merci of hem alleÞat wiþ
                    deuociounAnd wiþ preisyng on þe calleÞou herest heore
                    Orisoun
